item.title: Learning Go
item.description: Learning Go - Notes Notes which I took during my learning. It’d be great if they would also help you. Go workspace and basics MUST READ DOCUMENT Syntax Variable declaration if you define a variable within the if statement(condition) it is valid only there. You will not get an error for double declaration in the following example: for x := len(y); y > 1 { //... } for x := len(z); y > 1 { //.
